articles.title: Avian flu warning to tourists as birds face 'catastrophe' - BBC
articles.description: Thousands of dead and sick seabirds are being washed up along the UK's coastline as avian flu spreads.
articles.content:
Holidaymakers are being warned to stay away from sick or dead birds washed up on the UK's beaches as avian flu continues to ravage wild populations.

articles.title: Tiny surgical robots could transform detection and treatment of cancers - University of Leeds
articles.description: A tiny robot which can travel deep into the lungs to detect and treat the first signs of cancer has been developed by researchers at the University of Leeds.
articles.content:

articles.title: Scientists Discover RELMalpha Protein Protects Females Against Obesity - SciTechDaily
articles.description: UC Riverside mouse study describes mechanisms underlying sex differences for obesity. A study at UC Riverside found that female mice are more resistant to obesity due to the immune protein RELMalpha. When the protein was deleted, the females were susceptible …
articles.content:
